alert.note: Alert for Conecuh; Monroe (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 3:24PM CST until January 09 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Monroe County in south central Alabama... North central Conecuh County in south central Alabama... * Until 400 PM CST. * At 324 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Frisco City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroeville and Peterman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central and southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central and southwestern Alabama.
